middle.bigIntro1: Hello, I started programming for money but grew to enjoy it as well. So win, win! I studied it for four years and have gone through an internship too.
middle.bigIntro2: My greatest strengths focus on all things front-end and database related. However, I have ample experience with the backend as well. In my free time, I like reading novels, and I do try to write them myself. I am as thorough with my code as with any word I read or write for the sake of my art.
middle.project4Explanation: Made for fun with javascript and simple css. A true, undisputable masterpiece.
